TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Screen extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a display device or multiple display devices on a single system.

span.span: Represents a display device or multiple display devices on a single system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此物件的建構函式不是公用的因此您無法明確建立物件。The constructor for this object is not public, so you cannot explicitly create a object. 當您呼叫它的公用方法時，會建立物件。The object is created when you call its public methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用各種方法和屬性的類別。The following code example shows how to use various methods and properties of the class. 範例會呼叫連線到系統的屬性，以擷取所有畫面的陣列。The example calls the property to retrieve an array of all the screens connected to the system. 針對每個傳回，範例會加入裝置名稱、 範圍、 類型、 工作區和主要畫面。For each returned , the example adds the device name, bounds, type, working area, and primary screen to a . 若要使用的範例，請加入和至表單，然後再加入按鈕的事件處理常式。To use the example, add a and a to a form, and then add a event handler for the button. [!code-cpp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Screen Object Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Screen Object Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

public: property int BitsPerPixel { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data.

span.span: Gets the number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data.

value.span: 一個像素資料與相關聯的記憶體的位元數

span.span: The number of bits of memory, associated with one pixel of data

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，每個螢幕的像素的位元數時，使用點陣圖。Typically, the number of bits per pixel for a screen is useful when working with bitmaps. 如需有關點陣圖的詳細資訊，請參閱[類型的點陣圖](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md)。For more information about bitmaps, see [Types of Bitmaps](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/types-of-bitmaps.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於單一顯示系統中，主顯示器也是唯一的顯示。For a single display system, the primary display is the only display. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of property and the method. 這個方法會要求包含名為按鈕的表單`Button1`。This method requires a form containing a button named `Button1`. summary.span: Gets the working area of the display.

span.span: Gets the working area of the display.

summary.span: The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.

span.span: The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars.
A , representing the working area of the display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作區域是顯示、 工作列、 停駐的視窗和停駐的工具列排除桌面區域。The working area is the desktop area of the display, excluding taskbars, docked windows, and docked tool bars. 如果 Windows 工作列不論是否在工作列目前顯示或不設定為自動隱藏時，就會傳回整個螢幕區域。 will return the entire area of the screen if the Windows Taskbar is set to Auto-Hide, no matter whether the Taskbar is currently displayed or not.
